00026 btShapePairCallback gCompoundChildShapePairCallback = 0;

00028 btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm( const btCollisionAlgorithmConstructionInfo& ci,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,bool isSwapped)
00029 :btActivatingCollisionAlgorithm(ci,body0Wrap,body1Wrap),
00030 m_isSwapped(isSwapped),
00031 m_sharedManifold(ci.m_manifold)
00032 {
00033         m_ownsManifold = false;
00034 
00035         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObjWrap = m_isSwapped? body1Wrap : body0Wrap;
00036         btAssert (colObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00037         
00038         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(colObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00039         m_compoundShapeRevision = compoundShape->getUpdateRevision();
00040         
00041         
00042         preallocateChildAlgorithms(body0Wrap,body1Wrap);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void    btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::preallocateChildAlgorithms(const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap)
00046 {
00047         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObjWrap = m_isSwapped? body1Wrap : body0Wrap;
00048         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* otherObjWrap = m_isSwapped? body0Wrap : body1Wrap;
00049         btAssert (colObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00050         
00051         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(colObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00052 
00053         int numChildren = compoundShape->getNumChildShapes();
00054         int i;
00055         
00056         m_childCollisionAlgorithms.resize(numChildren);
00057         for (i=0;i<numChildren;i++)
00058         {
00059                 if (compoundShape->getDynamicAabbTree())
00060                 {
00061                         m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i] = 0;
00062                 } else
00063                 {
00064                         
00065                         const btCollisionShape* childShape = compoundShape->getChildShape(i);
00066 
00067                         btCollisionObjectWrapper childWrap(colObjWrap,childShape,colObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),colObjWrap->getWorldTransform(),-1,i);//wrong child trans, but unused (hopefully)
00068                         m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i] = m_dispatcher->findAlgorithm(&childWrap,otherObjWrap,m_sharedManifold, BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
00069 
00070 
00071                         btAlignedObjectArray<btCollisionAlgorithm*> m_childCollisionAlgorithmsContact;
00072                         btAlignedObjectArray<btCollisionAlgorithm*> m_childCollisionAlgorithmsClosestPoints;
00073 
00074 
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void    btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::removeChildAlgorithms()
00080 {
00081         int numChildren = m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size();
00082         int i;
00083         for (i=0;i<numChildren;i++)
00084         {
00085                 if (m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i])
00086                 {
00087                         m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00088                         m_dispatcher->freeCollisionAlgorithm(m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]);
00089                 }
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::~btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm()
00094 {
00095         removeChildAlgorithms();
00096 }

00101 struct  btCompoundLeafCallback : btDbvt::ICollide
00102 {
00103 
00104 public:
00105 
00106         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* m_compoundColObjWrap;
00107         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* m_otherObjWrap;
00108         btDispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00109         const btDispatcherInfo& m_dispatchInfo;
00110         btManifoldResult*       m_resultOut;
00111         btCollisionAlgorithm**  m_childCollisionAlgorithms;
00112         btPersistentManifold*   m_sharedManifold;
00113         
00114         btCompoundLeafCallback (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* compoundObjWrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* otherObjWrap,btDispatcher* dispatcher,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult*    resultOut,btCollisionAlgorithm**        childCollisionAlgorithms,btPersistentManifold*  sharedManifold)
00115                 :m_compoundColObjWrap(compoundObjWrap),m_otherObjWrap(otherObjWrap),m_dispatcher(dispatcher),m_dispatchInfo(dispatchInfo),m_resultOut(resultOut),

00123         void    ProcessChildShape(const btCollisionShape* childShape,int index)
00124         {
00125                 btAssert(index>=0);
00126                 const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(m_compoundColObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00127                 btAssert(index<compoundShape->getNumChildShapes());
00128 
00129 
00130                 //backup
00131                 btTransform     orgTrans = m_compoundColObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00132                 
00133                 const btTransform& childTrans = compoundShape->getChildTransform(index);
00134                 btTransform     newChildWorldTrans = orgTrans*childTrans ;
00135 
00136                 //perform an AABB check first
00137                 btVector3 aabbMin0,aabbMax0;
00138                 childShape->getAabb(newChildWorldTrans,aabbMin0,aabbMax0);
00139 
00140                 btVector3 extendAabb(m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold);
00141                 aabbMin0 -= extendAabb;
00142                 aabbMax0 += extendAabb;
00143 
00144                 btVector3 aabbMin1, aabbMax1;
00145                 m_otherObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(m_otherObjWrap->getWorldTransform(),aabbMin1,aabbMax1);
00146 
00147                 if (gCompoundChildShapePairCallback)
00148                 {
00149                         if (!gCompoundChildShapePairCallback(m_otherObjWrap->getCollisionShape(), childShape))
00150                                 return;
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 if (TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1))
00154                 {
00155 
00156                         btCollisionObjectWrapper compoundWrap(this->m_compoundColObjWrap,childShape,m_compoundColObjWrap->getCollisionObject(),newChildWorldTrans,-1,index);
00157                         
00158                         btCollisionAlgorithm* algo = 0;
00159 
00160                         if (m_resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold > 0)
00161                         {
00162                                 algo = m_dispatcher->findAlgorithm(&compoundWrap, m_otherObjWrap, 0, BT_CLOSEST_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
00163                         }
00164                         else
00165                         {
00166                                 //the contactpoint is still projected back using the original inverted worldtrans
00167                                 if (!m_childCollisionAlgorithms[index])
00168                                 {
00169                                         m_childCollisionAlgorithms[index] = m_dispatcher->findAlgorithm(&compoundWrap, m_otherObjWrap, m_sharedManifold, BT_CONTACT_POINT_ALGORITHMS);
00170                                 }
00171                                 algo = m_childCollisionAlgorithms[index];
00172                         }
00173                         
00174                         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* tmpWrap = 0;
00175 
00177                         if (m_resultOut->getBody0Internal() == m_compoundColObjWrap->getCollisionObject())
00178                         {
00179                                 tmpWrap = m_resultOut->getBody0Wrap();
00180                                 m_resultOut->setBody0Wrap(&compoundWrap);
00181                                 m_resultOut->setShapeIdentifiersA(-1,index);
00182                         } else
00183                         {
00184                                 tmpWrap = m_resultOut->getBody1Wrap();
00185                                 m_resultOut->setBody1Wrap(&compoundWrap);
00186                                 m_resultOut->setShapeIdentifiersB(-1,index);
00187                         }
00188 
00189                         algo->processCollision(&compoundWrap,m_otherObjWrap,m_dispatchInfo,m_resultOut);
00190 
00191 #if 0
00192                         if (m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw && (m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawAabb))
00193                         {
00194                                 btVector3 worldAabbMin,worldAabbMax;
00195                                 m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw->drawAabb(aabbMin0,aabbMax0,btVector3(1,1,1));
00196                                 m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw->drawAabb(aabbMin1,aabbMax1,btVector3(1,1,1));
00197                         }
00198 #endif
00199 
00200                         if (m_resultOut->getBody0Internal() == m_compoundColObjWrap->getCollisionObject())
00201                         {
00202                                 m_resultOut->setBody0Wrap(tmpWrap);
00203                         } else
00204                         {
00205                                 m_resultOut->setBody1Wrap(tmpWrap);
00206                         }
00207                         
00208                 }
00209         }
00210         void            Process(const btDbvtNode* leaf)
00211         {
00212                 int index = leaf->dataAsInt;
00213 
00214                 const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(m_compoundColObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00215                 const btCollisionShape* childShape = compoundShape->getChildShape(index);
00216 
00217 #if 0
00218                 if (m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw && (m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw->getDebugMode() & btIDebugDraw::DBG_DrawAabb))
00219                 {
00220                         btVector3 worldAabbMin,worldAabbMax;
00221                         btTransform     orgTrans = m_compoundColObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00222                         btTransformAabb(leaf->volume.Mins(),leaf->volume.Maxs(),0.,orgTrans,worldAabbMin,worldAabbMax);
00223                         m_dispatchInfo.m_debugDraw->drawAabb(worldAabbMin,worldAabbMax,btVector3(1,0,0));
00224                 }
00225 #endif
00226 
00227                 ProcessChildShape(childShape,index);
00228 
00229         }
00230 };

00236 
00237 void btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::processCollision (const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body0Wrap,const btCollisionObjectWrapper* body1Wrap,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00238 {
00239         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObjWrap = m_isSwapped? body1Wrap : body0Wrap;
00240         const btCollisionObjectWrapper* otherObjWrap = m_isSwapped? body0Wrap : body1Wrap;
00241 
00242         btAssert (colObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00243         const btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<const btCompoundShape*>(colObjWrap->getCollisionShape());
00244 
00247         if (compoundShape->getUpdateRevision() != m_compoundShapeRevision)
00248         {
00250                 removeChildAlgorithms();
00251                 
00252                 preallocateChildAlgorithms(body0Wrap,body1Wrap);
00253                 m_compoundShapeRevision = compoundShape->getUpdateRevision();
00254         }
00255 
00256     if (m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size()==0)
00257         return;
00258     
00259         const btDbvt* tree = compoundShape->getDynamicAabbTree();
00260         //use a dynamic aabb tree to cull potential child-overlaps
00261         btCompoundLeafCallback  callback(colObjWrap,otherObjWrap,m_dispatcher,dispatchInfo,resultOut,&m_childCollisionAlgorithms[0],m_sharedManifold);
00262 
00266         {
00267                 int i;
00268                 manifoldArray.resize(0);
00269                 for (i=0;i<m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size();i++)
00270                 {
00271                         if (m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i])
00272                         {
00273                                 m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]->getAllContactManifolds(manifoldArray);
00274                                 for (int m=0;m<manifoldArray.size();m++)
00275                                 {
00276                                         if (manifoldArray[m]->getNumContacts())
00277                                         {
00278                                                 resultOut->setPersistentManifold(manifoldArray[m]);
00279                                                 resultOut->refreshContactPoints();
00280                                                 resultOut->setPersistentManifold(0);//??necessary?
00281                                         }
00282                                 }
00283                                 manifoldArray.resize(0);
00284                         }
00285                 }
00286         }
00287 
00288         if (tree)
00289         {
00290 
00291                 btVector3 localAabbMin,localAabbMax;
00292                 btTransform otherInCompoundSpace;
00293                 otherInCompoundSpace = colObjWrap->getWorldTransform().inverse() * otherObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00294                 otherObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(otherInCompoundSpace,localAabbMin,localAabbMax);
00295                 btVector3 extraExtends(resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold, resultOut->m_closestPointDistanceThreshold);
00296                 localAabbMin -= extraExtends;
00297                 localAabbMax += extraExtends;
00298 
00299                 const ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume) bounds=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(localAabbMin,localAabbMax);
00300                 //process all children, that overlap with  the given AABB bounds
00301                 tree->collideTVNoStackAlloc(tree->m_root,bounds,stack2,callback);
00302 
00303         } else
00304         {
00305                 //iterate over all children, perform an AABB check inside ProcessChildShape
00306                 int numChildren = m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size();
00307                 int i;
00308                 for (i=0;i<numChildren;i++)
00309                 {
00310                         callback.ProcessChildShape(compoundShape->getChildShape(i),i);
00311                 }
00312         }
00313 
00314         {
00315                                 //iterate over all children, perform an AABB check inside ProcessChildShape
00316                 int numChildren = m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size();
00317                 int i;
00318                 manifoldArray.resize(0);
00319         const btCollisionShape* childShape = 0;
00320         btTransform     orgTrans;
00321         
00322         btTransform     newChildWorldTrans;
00323         btVector3 aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1;        
00324         
00325                 for (i=0;i<numChildren;i++)
00326                 {
00327                         if (m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i])
00328                         {
00329                                 childShape = compoundShape->getChildShape(i);
00330                         //if not longer overlapping, remove the algorithm
00331                                 orgTrans = colObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
00332                 
00333                                 const btTransform& childTrans = compoundShape->getChildTransform(i);
00334                 newChildWorldTrans = orgTrans*childTrans ;
00335 
00336                                 //perform an AABB check first
00337                                 childShape->getAabb(newChildWorldTrans,aabbMin0,aabbMax0);
00338                                 otherObjWrap->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(otherObjWrap->getWorldTransform(),aabbMin1,aabbMax1);
00339 
00340                                 if (!TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin0,aabbMax0,aabbMin1,aabbMax1))
00341                                 {
00342                                         m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00343                                         m_dispatcher->freeCollisionAlgorithm(m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]);
00344                                         m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i] = 0;
00345                                 }
00346                         }
00347                 }
00348         }
00349 }
00350 
00351 btScalar        btCompoundCollisionAlgorithm::calculateTimeOfImpact(btCollisionObject* body0,btCollisionObject* body1,const btDispatcherInfo& dispatchInfo,btManifoldResult* resultOut)
00352 {
00353         btAssert(0);
00354         //needs to be fixed, using btCollisionObjectWrapper and NOT modifying internal data structures
00355         btCollisionObject* colObj = m_isSwapped? body1 : body0;
00356         btCollisionObject* otherObj = m_isSwapped? body0 : body1;
00357 
00358         btAssert (colObj->getCollisionShape()->isCompound());
00359         
00360         btCompoundShape* compoundShape = static_cast<btCompoundShape*>(colObj->getCollisionShape());
00361 
00362         //We will use the OptimizedBVH, AABB tree to cull potential child-overlaps
00363         //If both proxies are Compound, we will deal with that directly, by performing sequential/parallel tree traversals
00364         //given Proxy0 and Proxy1, if both have a tree, Tree0 and Tree1, this means:
00365         //determine overlapping nodes of Proxy1 using Proxy0 AABB against Tree1
00366         //then use each overlapping node AABB against Tree0
00367         //and vise versa.
00368 
00369         btScalar hitFraction = btScalar(1.);
00370 
00371         int numChildren = m_childCollisionAlgorithms.size();
00372         int i;
00373     btTransform orgTrans;
00374     btScalar frac;
00375         for (i=0;i<numChildren;i++)
00376         {
00377                 //btCollisionShape* childShape = compoundShape->getChildShape(i);
00378 
00379                 //backup
00380         orgTrans = colObj->getWorldTransform();
00381         
00382                 const btTransform& childTrans = compoundShape->getChildTransform(i);
00383                 //btTransform   newChildWorldTrans = orgTrans*childTrans ;
00384                 colObj->setWorldTransform( orgTrans*childTrans );
00385 
00386                 //btCollisionShape* tmpShape = colObj->getCollisionShape();
00387                 //colObj->internalSetTemporaryCollisionShape( childShape );
00388         frac = m_childCollisionAlgorithms[i]->calculateTimeOfImpact(colObj,otherObj,dispatchInfo,resultOut);
00389                 if (frac<hitFraction)
00390                 {
00391                         hitFraction = frac;
00392                 }
00393                 //revert back
00394                 //colObj->internalSetTemporaryCollisionShape( tmpShape);
00395                 colObj->setWorldTransform( orgTrans);
00396         }
00397         return hitFraction;
00398 
00399 }
